#Objects

pa point
pb point
pca point
pcb point
pd point
pe point

lab line
lc line
lad line

ca circle

#Relations

start_point(pa, lab)
end_point(pb, lab)

start_point(pca, lc)
end_point(pcb, lc)

start_point(pa, lad)
end_point(pd, lad)

length_longer(lab, lc)
lenght_equal(lad, lc)

centre(pa, ca)
coincident(pd, ca)
coincident(pe, ca)
coincident(pe, lab)
